ygData.subject: Re: GENERAL TIP
ygData.msgSnippet: The prophets have declared that on 5/14/99 at 1:07 PM Cillo, Christopher L. ... hacking ... MED ... For those of you with the Forage skill, this also works
ygData.messageBody:
The prophets have declared that on 5/14/99 at 1:07 PM Cillo, Christopher L.
spake thus:

>Another tip with working on skills, if you need to take a break from
hacking
>and slashing and you want to relax and make a little money try fishing.
>While you are fishing you can MED. So practice spells till out of mana,
MED
>and you can still fish, and work on Sense heading.

For those of you with the Forage skill, this also works while fishing.

Another general tip for the fighter-types: be sure to use your Taunt skill
while fighting solo. It'll come in handy when you group. Wish I had thought
of this before I got to 8th level :(

Rick

--
! Ranger Lambert
! Veeshan server
!
! Heed the wishes of Tunare and only bare yourself when alone!
